Posts.Content: I to have breast pain mine is caused through having a lump removed after my cancer surgery and now the tissue is not growing properly and the cavity is filling with fluid which can be very painful. I have it fluid removed but as soon as it is done by the time I get home it is filled again. Also have pain in arm due to Lymphodema massage does help but not always. I suppose one has to get used it.
Posts.Title: is Anyone Suffering Pain From a Mastectomy or
